description.@en: The art of turning metals, filing silver and smelting ores into usable objects takes a certain kind of skill.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Blacksmithing. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Blacksmithing, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
